en.name: Chia Seeds
en.short_description: Rich in fiber and omega-3s for digestion and heart health
en.long_description: Chia seeds are tiny nutrient-dense seeds packed with fiber, omega-3 fatty acids, protein, and antioxidants. They support digestion, improve heart health, and help maintain energy levels throughout the day.

recipes.name: Chia Pudding with Almond Milk
directions: Mix chia seeds and almond milk in a bowl or jar.
Add maple syrup and vanilla.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight until it thickens.

recipes.name: Chia Seed Smoothie
directions: Blend all ingredients together until smooth.
Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Chia Overnight Oats
directions: Combine oats, chia seeds, milk, and sweetener in a jar.
Stir well and refrigerate overnight.
Top with fruits before serving.

recipes.name: Berry Chia Jam
directions: Simmer berries in a saucepan until soft.
Mash and stir in chia seeds.
Cool and refrigerate for 1 hour to set.

recipes.name: Chia Banana Pancakes
directions: Mash banana and mix with egg, oats, chia seeds, and cinnamon.
Cook on a non-stick pan until golden on both sides.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt with Chia
directions: Mix Greek yogurt and chia seeds.
Top with fruits and drizzle of honey.

recipes.name: Mango Chia Parfait
directions: Blend mango into a puree.
Layer chia pudding and mango puree in a glass.
Top with coconut flakes.

recipes.name: Chia Egg Substitute Muffins
directions: Mix chia seeds and water to create chia egg.
Combine with flour, banana, baking powder, and cinnamon.
Pour into muffin tins and bake at 350°F for 15–20 minutes.

en.name: Greek Yogurt
en.short_description: Packed with protein and probiotics for gut and muscle health
en.long_description: Greek yogurt is rich in protein, calcium, and probiotics that support gut health, aid digestion, and help in muscle recovery. It's a versatile base for both sweet and savory meals.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
directions: Layer yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass.
Top with honey and serve chilled.

recipes.name: Yogurt and Honey Bowl
directions: Spoon yogurt into a bowl and drizzle with honey.
Add nuts and a sprinkle of cinnamon.

recipes.name: Berry Yogurt Smoothie
directions: Blend yogurt, berries, banana, and milk until smooth.
Serve cold.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt with Granola
directions: Mix Greek yogurt with granola and fresh fruit.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Yogurt and Chia Breakfast
directions: Stir chia seeds into yogurt and let sit for 5 minutes.
Top with fruit and a drizzle of maple syrup.

recipes.name: Savory Yogurt with Cucumber
directions: Mix yogurt with grated cucumber, salt, and herbs.
Serve as a dip or side.

recipes.name: Frozen Yogurt Bites
directions: Spoon yogurt into ice cube trays or molds.
Top with fruit and freeze for 2 hours.

recipes.name: Yogurt Protein Pancakes
directions: Mix yogurt, egg, oats, and baking powder into a batter.
Cook in a pan until golden on both sides.

en.name: Banana
en.short_description: Rich in potassium and fiber, great for energy and digestion
en.long_description: Bananas are a versatile and nutrient-rich fruit that provides quick energy, supports digestive health, and is a natural source of potassium. Ideal for pre- or post-workout meals.

recipes.name: Banana Oat Pancakes
directions: Mash banana and mix with oats, egg, and baking powder to form a batter.
Cook on a non-stick pan until golden on both sides.

recipes.name: Peanut Butter Banana Toast
directions: Spread peanut butter on toast and top with banana slices.
Sprinkle with cinnamon or chia seeds if desired.

recipes.name: Banana Smoothie
directions: Blend banana with milk, yogurt, and a touch of honey until smooth.
Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Baked Banana Oatmeal
directions: Mix mashed banana with oats, milk, and cinnamon and pour into a baking dish.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 20 minutes until set.

recipes.name: Banana Chia Pudding
directions: Blend banana with milk and stir in chia seeds.
Refrigerate for 2 hours or overnight until thickened.

recipes.name: Frozen Banana Pops
directions: Insert sticks into banana halves, dip in yogurt and roll in granola.
Freeze for at least 2 hours.

recipes.name: Banana and Yogurt Bowl
directions: Combine sliced banana with yogurt and top with nuts or seeds.
Serve fresh.

recipes.name: Banana Protein Muffins
directions: Mix mashed banana with oats, protein powder, egg, and baking powder.
Pour into muffin cups and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 20 minutes.

en.name: Oats
en.short_description: Rich in fiber and slow-digesting carbs to support energy and digestion
en.long_description: Oats are whole grains packed with soluble fiber, especially beta-glucan, which helps lower cholesterol and supports heart and digestive health. They offer sustained energy—ideal for breakfast and pre-workout meals.

recipes.name: Overnight Oats
directions: Mix oats, milk, chia seeds, and honey in a jar
Refrigerate overnight and top with fruits before serving

recipes.name: Oatmeal with Fruits
directions: Cook oats with water or milk until soft
Top with sliced fruits and nuts

recipes.name: Oat Banana Pancakes
directions: Blend oats, banana, egg, and baking powder into a batter
Cook pancakes in a non-stick pan

recipes.name: Oat and Nut Bars
directions: Mix oats, nuts, honey, and nut butter in a bowl
Press into a pan and chill until firm

recipes.name: Oat Smoothie
directions: Blend oats, banana, milk, and peanut butter until smooth
Serve chilled

recipes.name: Savory Oat Bowl
directions: Cook oats in water and stir in salt and herbs
Top with sautéed vegetables and a poached egg

recipes.name: Baked Oatmeal Cups
directions: Mix oats, milk, egg, banana, and cinnamon in a bowl
Scoop into muffin tins and bake until set

recipes.name: Oat and Chia Energy Balls
directions: Mix oats, chia seeds, peanut butter, and honey
Roll into balls and refrigerate

en.name: Almond Butter
en.short_description: High in healthy fats and protein for lasting energy
en.long_description: Almond butter is a nutrient-rich spread packed with monounsaturated fats, protein, vitamin E, and magnesium. It supports heart health, provides lasting energy, and is perfect for high-protein meals and snacks.

recipes.name: Almond Butter Toast
directions: Toast bread slices
Spread almond butter and top with banana or berries

recipes.name: Banana Almond Butter Smoothie
directions: Blend banana, almond butter, milk, and oats until smooth
Serve chilled

recipes.name: Almond Butter Oats
directions: Cook oats and stir in almond butter and cinnamon
Top with fruits and seeds

recipes.name: Apple Slices with Almond Butter
directions: Slice apple and spread almond butter
Sprinkle with cinnamon if desired

recipes.name: Almond Butter Protein Balls
directions: Mix almond butter, oats, honey, and protein powder
Roll into balls and refrigerate

recipes.name: Almond Butter and Honey Wrap
directions: Spread almond butter and honey on a whole grain wrap
Roll up and enjoy

recipes.name: Almond Butter Yogurt Bowl
directions: Mix almond butter into yogurt
Top with granola and fruits

recipes.name: Almond Butter Banana Sandwich
directions: Spread almond butter on bread and add banana slices
Top with another slice and serve

en.name: Berries
en.short_description: Antioxidant-rich and naturally sweet
en.long_description: Berries are low in calories and high in fiber, vitamins, and antioxidants. They support heart health, improve blood sugar levels, and are perfect for refreshing, high-protein meals.

recipes.name: Berry Smoothie Bowl
directions: Blend frozen berries, banana, and yogurt until smooth
Pour into a bowl and top with granola and fresh fruits

recipes.name: Berries with Yogurt and Honey
directions: Mix berries into yogurt
Drizzle with honey and serve

recipes.name: Oatmeal with Mixed Berries
directions: Cook oats and stir in cinnamon
Top with mixed berries and a splash of milk

recipes.name: Berry Chia Pudding
directions: Mix chia seeds, milk, and berries
Refrigerate overnight and serve chilled

recipes.name: Frozen Berry Yogurt Bark
directions: Spread yogurt on a baking sheet
Top with berries and freeze until solid, then break into pieces

recipes.name: Berry Pancakes
directions: Prepare pancake batter and fold in berries
Cook on a skillet and serve with maple syrup

recipes.name: Berry and Banana Smoothie
directions: Blend berries, banana, and milk until smooth
Serve chilled

recipes.name: Berries and Cottage Cheese Cup
directions: Spoon cottage cheese into a bowl
Top with fresh berries and enjoy

en.name: Flaxseeds
en.short_description: Rich in fiber and omega-3s
en.long_description: Flaxseeds are a plant-based source of omega-3 fatty acids and fiber. They support digestive health and help maintain heart health, making them a powerful nutritional add-in for breakfast.

recipes.name: Flaxseed Smoothie
directions: Blend banana, milk, and flaxseeds until smooth
Serve chilled

recipes.name: Flax Oatmeal
directions: Cook oats and stir in flaxseeds and cinnamon
Top with berries and serve

recipes.name: Flaxseed Muffins
directions: Mix muffin batter and stir in flaxseeds
Bake at 350°F for 20 minutes

recipes.name: Yogurt with Flax and Fruit
directions: Stir flaxseeds into yogurt
Top with chopped fruits and serve

recipes.name: Flax Banana Pancakes
directions: Mix mashed banana, eggs, oats, and flaxseeds
Cook on skillet until golden brown

recipes.name: Flax Chia Overnight Oats
directions: Mix oats, milk, flaxseeds, and chia seeds
Refrigerate overnight and top with fruits

recipes.name: Nutty Flax Energy Bites
directions: Mix flaxseeds, oats, peanut butter, and honey
Form into balls and refrigerate

recipes.name: Flax and Apple Breakfast Bowl
directions: Combine chopped apples, flaxseeds, and yogurt
Top with cinnamon and serve

en.name: Boiled Egg
en.short_description: Protein-packed and versatile
en.long_description: Boiled eggs are a quick and nutritious source of high-quality protein and healthy fats. They are great for building muscle, supporting weight management, and keeping you full throughout the morning.

recipes.name: Sliced Egg Toast
directions: Toast bread and layer with sliced boiled eggs
Season with salt and pepper and serve

recipes.name: Egg Salad Wrap
directions: Mix chopped boiled eggs with yogurt and mustard
Fill into whole wheat wrap and roll

recipes.name: Boiled Egg and Avocado Bowl
directions: Slice boiled egg and avocado into a bowl
Top with olive oil, pepper, and lemon juice

recipes.name: Egg and Veggie Sandwich
directions: Layer bread with boiled egg slices and veggies
Top with another slice and serve

recipes.name: Boiled Egg with Hummus
directions: Cut boiled egg in half and serve with hummus on the side
Sprinkle paprika and enjoy

recipes.name: Egg and Cottage Cheese Plate
directions: Arrange sliced egg and cottage cheese on a plate
Season with herbs and black pepper

recipes.name: Simple Egg and Spinach Bowl
directions: Mix boiled egg slices with steamed spinach
Drizzle olive oil and serve

recipes.name: Egg and Oat Savory Muffins
directions: Mix oats, egg, veggies, and bake in muffin tins at 350°F for 15 mins
Cool and serve

en.name: Cottage Cheese
en.short_description: Low-fat, high-protein dairy
en.long_description: Cottage cheese is rich in protein and low in fat, making it an excellent choice for a healthy breakfast. It supports muscle growth, aids in weight management, and pairs well with both sweet and savory ingredients.

recipes.name: Cottage Cheese and Berries Bowl
directions: Spoon cottage cheese into a bowl
Top with fresh mixed berries and serve

recipes.name: Cottage Cheese Toast
directions: Toast bread and spread with cottage cheese
Top with tomatoes or berries

recipes.name: Cottage Cheese and Banana Smoothie
directions: Blend cottage cheese, banana, milk, and honey until smooth
Serve chilled

recipes.name: Savory Cottage Cheese Bowl
directions: Mix cottage cheese with chopped veggies and herbs
Drizzle olive oil and serve

recipes.name: Cottage Cheese Oats
directions: Cook oats and stir in cottage cheese before serving
Top with fruit or cinnamon

recipes.name: Fruit and Cottage Cheese Salad
directions: Combine chopped fruits with cottage cheese
Garnish with mint or a drizzle of honey

recipes.name: Cottage Cheese with Nuts & Honey
directions: Top cottage cheese with chopped nuts
Drizzle with honey and serve

recipes.name: Cottage Cheese Scramble Wrap
directions: Scramble egg with cottage cheese and veggies
Wrap in a tortilla and serve

en.name: Avocado
en.short_description: Creamy fruit rich in healthy fats
en.long_description: Avocados are nutrient-dense and packed with healthy monounsaturated fats, fiber, and essential vitamins. They promote heart health, improve digestion, and add creaminess and flavor to meals.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
directions: Toast the bread and mash avocado on top
Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and optional chili flakes

recipes.name: Egg and Avocado Bowl
directions: Slice boiled eggs and avocado into a bowl
Drizzle with olive oil and season

recipes.name: Avocado Banana Smoothie
directions: Blend avocado, banana, milk, and honey until smooth
Serve chilled

recipes.name: Avocado and Berry Salad
directions: Combine diced avocado with mixed berries
Toss with lemon juice and serve

recipes.name: Avocado and Cottage Cheese Toast
directions: Toast bread and top with cottage cheese and avocado slices
Season with black pepper

recipes.name: Stuffed Avocado with Tuna
directions: Halve avocado and fill with tuna salad
Serve with a spoon or over greens

recipes.name: Avocado Oat Pancakes
directions: Blend oats, egg, avocado, and milk into a batter
Cook pancakes on a heated pan until golden

recipes.name: Avocado and Hummus Wrap
directions: Spread hummus on wrap and layer with avocado slices
Roll and serve fresh

en.name: Sunflower Seeds
en.short_description: Crunchy seeds rich in healthy fats and vitamin E
en.long_description: Sunflower seeds are a great source of healthy fats, vitamin E, and selenium. They support immune function, skin health, and add a delightful crunch and nutty flavor to meals.

recipes.name: Sunflower Seed Granola
directions: Mix oats, sunflower seeds, honey, and oil
Bake until golden and crunchy

recipes.name: Yogurt with Sunflower Topping
directions: Top yogurt with sunflower seeds and fruit
Drizzle with honey if desired

recipes.name: Oatmeal with Sunflower Crunch
directions: Cook oats and top with sunflower seeds and cinnamon
Add fruits or nuts as desired

recipes.name: Avocado Toast with Seeds
directions: Spread mashed avocado on toast
Sprinkle with sunflower seeds and seasoning

recipes.name: Banana Sunflower Seed Muffins
directions: Mix mashed banana, flour, seeds, and baking ingredients
Bake until golden brown

recipes.name: Berry Smoothie with Seeds
directions: Blend berries, yogurt, milk, and sunflower seeds
Serve chilled

recipes.name: Sunflower and Flax Bites
directions: Mix sunflower seeds, flaxseeds, nut butter, and honey
Roll into bites and refrigerate

recipes.name: Egg and Seed Breakfast Bowl
directions: Slice boiled egg and combine with avocado and sunflower seeds
Serve in a bowl with salt and pepper

en.name: Kiwi
en.short_description: Tart green fruit packed with vitamin C and fiber
en.long_description: Kiwi is a tangy fruit loaded with vitamin C, antioxidants, and dietary fiber. It supports immune function, digestion, and adds a refreshing flavor to both sweet and savory breakfast dishes.

recipes.name: Kiwi and Yogurt Bowl
directions: Slice kiwi and layer over yogurt
Top with granola or seeds

recipes.name: Kiwi Chia Parfait
directions: Layer chia pudding with sliced kiwi and yogurt
Chill and serve

recipes.name: Kiwi and Banana Smoothie
directions: Blend kiwi, banana, and yogurt until smooth
Add honey if needed

recipes.name: Kiwi with Cottage Cheese
directions: Top cottage cheese with sliced kiwi
Drizzle with honey or sprinkle nuts

recipes.name: Kiwi Oatmeal Bowl
directions: Cook oats and top with kiwi and seeds
Drizzle with maple syrup if desired

recipes.name: Kiwi and Berry Salad
directions: Combine sliced kiwi with berries in a bowl
Top with lime juice or mint

recipes.name: Kiwi Toast with Cream Cheese
directions: Spread cream cheese on toast and top with kiwi slices
Add a drizzle of honey

recipes.name: Kiwi and Chia Pudding
directions: Prepare chia pudding and top with kiwi slices
Chill and enjoy

en.name: Spinach
en.short_description: A leafy green packed with iron, vitamins, and antioxidants.
en.long_description: Spinach is a nutrient-rich leafy vegetable that supports healthy skin, hair, and bones. It's a versatile ingredient ideal for salads, wraps, stir-fries, and bowls, making it a great choice for a balanced lunch.

recipes.name: Spinach Chickpea Salad
directions: Rinse and drain chickpeas.
In a bowl, combine fresh spinach, chickpeas, chopped cucumber, and cherry tomatoes.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Toss to coat and serve.

recipes.name: Spinach Quinoa Bowl
directions: Cook quinoa according to instructions.
Sauté spinach lightly in olive oil until wilted.
Mix quinoa, spinach, and a boiled egg in a bowl.
Season with black pepper and a dash of salt.

recipes.name: Spinach Tofu Wrap
directions: Sauté tofu cubes with olive oil and paprika until golden.
Lay a whole grain wrap flat and add spinach, sautéed tofu, and hummus.
Roll tightly and cut in half to serve.

recipes.name: Spinach Lentil Soup
directions: In a pot, sauté garlic and onion in olive oil.
Add lentils, vegetable broth, and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, add spinach, and simmer until lentils are soft.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.name: Spinach Mushroom Brown Rice
directions: Cook brown rice and set aside.
Sauté mushrooms until soft, then add spinach and cook until wilted.
Mix in rice, season with soy sauce, and stir well before serving.

recipes.name: Spinach Pumpkin Seed Salad
directions: In a bowl, combine fresh spinach, shredded carrots, and sliced apple.
Top with pumpkin seeds and crumbled feta.
Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil before serving.

recipes.name: Spinach Tomato Egg Bowl
directions: Sauté spinach and cherry tomatoes in olive oil until soft.
Top with two halved boiled eggs and sprinkle with black pepper.
Serve warm in a bowl or over toast.

recipes.name: Spinach Sweet Potato Plate
directions: Roast cubed sweet potatoes with olive oil until golden.
Sauté spinach until wilted, season lightly.
Serve spinach and sweet potatoes side by side or mixed in a bowl.

en.name: Quinoa
en.short_description: A complete protein grain rich in fiber and essential nutrients.
en.long_description: Quinoa is a gluten-free seed that cooks like a grain and is known for its high protein content and balanced amino acids. It's perfect for salads, bowls, and warm dishes for a hearty and healthy lunch.

recipes.name: Quinoa Veggie Bowl
directions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Steam broccoli and carrots until tender.
In a bowl, combine quinoa, steamed vegetables, and diced avocado.
Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil before serving.

recipes.name: Quinoa Chickpea Salad
directions: In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa, canned chickpeas, chopped cucumber, and tomato.
Add fresh parsley and toss with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

recipes.name: Quinoa Black Bean Bowl
directions: Mix cooked quinoa with black beans, corn, and diced red bell pepper.
Add cumin and lime juice for flavor.
Top with chopped cilantro and serve.

recipes.name: Quinoa and Hummus Plate
directions: Scoop hummus onto a plate and spread slightly.
Add cooked quinoa, sliced cucumber, and tomato wedges.
Sprinkle with paprika and a few drops of olive oil.

recipes.name: Quinoa Tofu Stir-Fry
directions: Sauté tofu cubes in sesame oil until golden.
Add bell pepper and snow peas and stir-fry briefly.
Mix in cooked quinoa and soy sauce. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Quinoa Avocado Salad
directions: Combine quinoa, chopped avocado, red onion, and cilantro in a bowl.
Add lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper to taste.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

recipes.name: Boiled Egg Quinoa Bowl
directions: Slice boiled eggs and layer over a bed of quinoa.
Add steamed spinach and a drizzle of tahini dressing.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds if desired.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Quinoa Bowl
directions: Roast sweet potato cubes with olive oil and cumin until tender.
Serve over quinoa and top with arugula.
Drizzle with a mix of lemon juice and tahini.

en.name: Pumpkin Seeds
en.short_description: A crunchy and nutrient-dense seed rich in magnesium, zinc, and protein.
en.long_description: Pumpkin seeds are a powerful plant-based protein source, providing essential nutrients and healthy fats. They add a satisfying crunch to salads, bowls, and spreads, enhancing both taste and nutrition.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Seed Spinach Salad
directions: Place fresh spinach in a bowl.
Top with cherry tomatoes, sliced cucumber, and shredded carrots.
Sprinkle pumpkin seeds on top and drizzle with lemon vinaigrette.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Seed Quinoa Bowl
directions: In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa with steamed broccoli and chopped red bell pepper.
Sprinkle pumpkin seeds and chopped parsley on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice before serving.

recipes.name: Hummus and Pumpkin Seed Wrap
directions: Spread hummus on a whole wheat wrap.
Add spinach, shredded carrots, and sliced cucumbers.
Sprinkle with pumpkin seeds and roll the wrap tightly.

recipes.name: Lentil Salad with Pumpkin Seeds
directions: Combine cooked lentils, diced tomatoes, and chopped cucumbers in a bowl.
Add chopped parsley and pumpkin seeds.
Season with lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.

recipes.name: Tofu and Pumpkin Seed Bowl
directions: Pan-fry tofu until golden and slightly crispy.
Serve with steamed kale and brown rice.
Sprinkle pumpkin seeds on top and serve with soy sauce drizzle.

recipes.name: Boiled Egg and Pumpkin Seed Salad
directions: Slice boiled eggs and place over mixed greens.
Add cherry tomatoes and cucumber slices.
Top with pumpkin seeds and vinaigrette of choice.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato and Pumpkin Seed Plate
directions: Roast cubed sweet potato with olive oil and paprika.
Serve over arugula or spinach and sprinkle with pumpkin seeds.
Add a spoon of tahini dressing if desired.

recipes.name: Cucumber Pumpkin Seed Salad
directions: Thinly slice cucumber and combine with shredded carrots.
Sprinkle with pumpkin seeds and drizzle with rice vinegar and sesame oil.
Toss well and serve cold.

en.name: Boiled Eggs
en.short_description: A protein-packed lunch add-in that's versatile and satiating.
en.long_description: Boiled eggs are a convenient and nutritious source of protein, healthy fats, and vitamins. They're easy to prepare and perfect for salads, sandwiches, bowls, and more.

recipes.name: Boiled Egg Avocado Toast
directions: Toast a slice of whole grain bread.
Mash avocado on the toast and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Slice boiled eggs and place on top of the avocado.
Sprinkle with chili flakes or everything bagel seasoning if desired.

recipes.name: Boiled Egg Quinoa Bowl
directions: Cook quinoa and let it cool slightly.
Place quinoa in a bowl with sliced boiled eggs, cherry tomatoes, and spinach.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice before serving.

recipes.name: Boiled Egg Veggie Wrap
directions: Chop boiled eggs and mix with chopped cucumber and tomato.
Spread hummus on a whole wheat wrap and add the egg mixture.
Roll the wrap tightly and slice in half to serve.

recipes.name: Egg Salad Bowl
directions: Slice boiled eggs and place them over a bed of mixed greens.
Add sliced cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, and shredded carrots.
Top with a vinaigrette of olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Egg Bowl
directions: Roast cubed sweet potato until tender.
Layer in a bowl with spinach and sliced boiled eggs.
Drizzle with tahini or lemon dressing before serving.

recipes.name: Egg and Tofu Salad
directions: Cube tofu and lightly pan-fry until golden.
Combine tofu with chopped boiled eggs, diced tomatoes, and cucumbers.
Dress with sesame oil and soy sauce and toss gently before serving.

recipes.name: Egg and Lentil Bowl
directions: Cook lentils and season with cumin, salt, and lemon juice.
Top with sliced boiled eggs and a handful of chopped parsley.
Serve warm with a side of pita or rice if desired.

recipes.name: Boiled Egg Brown Rice Bowl
directions: Layer cooked brown rice in a bowl.
Top with sliced boiled eggs, shredded carrots, and sliced cucumbers.
Add a drizzle of soy sauce and sprinkle with sesame seeds.

en.name: Sweet Potato
en.short_description: A fiber-rich, naturally sweet root vegetable perfect for lunch bowls and wraps
en.long_description: Sweet potatoes are packed with fiber, complex carbs, and vitamins like A and C. They add a naturally sweet flavor and creamy texture to lunch dishes, pairing well with grains, legumes, and greens.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Buddha Bowl
directions: Roast sweet potato cubes with olive oil and spices until tender.
In a bowl, layer with quinoa, chickpeas, spinach, and avocado.
Drizzle with tahini or lemon dressing before serving.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Quinoa Salad
directions: Toss roasted sweet potato with cooked quinoa, black beans, and red bell pepper.
Add chopped cilantro and squeeze lime juice.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Hummus Wrap
directions: Spread hummus on a whole grain wrap.
Top with mashed sweet potato, shredded lettuce, and cucumber slices.
Wrap tightly and cut in half to serve.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Lentil Plate
directions: Combine roasted sweet potatoes with warm lentils and steamed broccoli.
Add a drizzle of olive oil and lemon juice.
Garnish with parsley and serve hot.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Rice Bowl
directions: Add sweet potato cubes to a bowl of warm brown rice.
Top with sautéed greens, sliced avocado, and sesame seeds.
Serve with soy or tamari sauce.

recipes.name: Spiced Sweet Potato Soup
directions: Blend cooked sweet potatoes with vegetable broth, garlic, and spices.
Simmer until warm and creamy.
Serve with a drizzle of coconut milk and fresh herbs.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Black Bean Tacos
directions: Roast diced sweet potatoes with cumin and chili powder.
Serve in taco shells with black beans, salsa, and lettuce.
Top with lime juice and cilantro.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato and Tofu Plate
directions: Sauté tofu cubes until golden.
Add roasted sweet potato and steamed green beans.
Serve with a soy-ginger sauce drizzle.

en.name: Lentils
en.short_description: Protein-rich legumes perfect for hearty and healthy meals
en.long_description: Lentils are nutrient-dense legumes high in protein, fiber, and essential minerals. They are versatile, cook quickly, and support digestive and heart health, making them an excellent base for lunch dishes.

recipes.name: Lentil Buddha Bowl
directions: Add cooked lentils to a bowl with roasted sweet potatoes and sautéed kale.
Top with sliced avocado and drizzle with tahini sauce.
Serve warm or at room temperature.

recipes.name: Lentil Veggie Wrap
directions: Mash lentils slightly and mix with diced veggies and spices.
Spread on a whole wheat wrap and top with spinach and tomato.
Roll up and serve sliced in halves.

recipes.name: Lentil Salad Bowl
directions: Combine lentils, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and parsley in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Toss and chill before serving.

recipes.name: Spiced Lentil Soup
directions: Sauté garlic and onion, then add carrots and spices.
Add cooked lentils and vegetable broth.
Simmer until flavors blend and serve warm.

recipes.name: Lentil and Hummus Bowl
directions: Layer lentils with chopped tomatoes, cucumber, and arugula.
Top with a dollop of hummus and sprinkle with sesame seeds.
Drizzle with olive oil and serve.

recipes.name: Lentil Brown Rice Plate
directions: Mix cooked lentils with brown rice and olive oil.
Top with chopped parsley and lemon zest.
Serve as a warm grain bowl.

recipes.name: Lentil Avocado Salad
directions: Combine lentils with diced avocado, tomato, and cilantro.
Squeeze fresh lime juice and gently toss.
Serve immediately for freshness.

recipes.name: Lentil Sweet Potato Wrap
directions: Spread mashed sweet potato on a wrap.
Add cooked lentils and shredded cabbage.
Roll and heat slightly before serving.

en.name: Hummus
en.short_description: Creamy chickpea spread rich in protein and fiber
en.long_description: Hummus is a Middle Eastern spread made from blended chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic. It’s rich in protein, healthy fats, and fiber, making it a great addition to healthy lunches.

recipes.name: Hummus Veggie Wrap
directions: Spread hummus on a whole wheat tortilla.
Add shredded lettuce, cucumber, tomato slices, and grated carrots.
Roll up tightly and cut in half to serve.

recipes.name: Hummus Quinoa Bowl
directions: Spoon cooked quinoa into a bowl.
Top with hummus, steamed broccoli, cherry tomatoes, and olives.
Drizzle with lemon juice before serving.

recipes.name: Hummus Stuffed Pita
directions: Cut a pita pocket in half and open gently.
Spread hummus inside and fill with cucumber slices, spinach, and bell pepper strips.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

recipes.name: Hummus Chickpea Salad
directions: Mix chickpeas with diced tomatoes, cucumbers, and red onion.
Stir in hummus and lemon juice until evenly coated.
Serve chilled or as a side dish.

recipes.name: Hummus Rice Bowl
directions: Place cooked brown rice in a bowl.
Top with a generous spoon of hummus, roasted sweet potato cubes, and kale.
Drizzle with olive oil before serving.

recipes.name: Hummus Avocado Sandwich
directions: Spread hummus on one slice of bread and mashed avocado on another.
Layer with spinach and tomato slices.
Close sandwich and slice in half to serve.

recipes.name: Hummus Lentil Wrap
directions: Warm cooked lentils in a pan with spices.
Spread hummus on a wrap and fill with lentils, shredded cabbage, and chopped tomatoes.
Roll and enjoy warm or chilled.

recipes.name: Hummus Tofu Salad
directions: Sauté tofu cubes until golden and crispy.
In a bowl, mix tofu with mixed greens and sliced cucumber.
Top with hummus and a drizzle of balsamic vinegar.

en.name: Broccoli
en.short_description: Cruciferous vegetable rich in nutrients
en.long_description: Broccoli is a cruciferous vegetable packed with vitamins C and K, fiber, and antioxidants. It's a popular choice for healthy lunches and pairs well with grains, proteins, and sauces in various cuisines.

recipes.name: Broccoli Chicken Stir-Fry
directions: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and sauté in a pan until browned.
Add chopped broccoli and cook for another 5 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and stir well until broccoli is tender-crisp.
Serve warm with brown rice or noodles.

recipes.name: Broccoli Quinoa Bowl
directions: Steam broccoli until bright green and tender.
Mix with cooked quinoa, cherry tomatoes, and lemon juice.
Top with feta cheese and serve warm or cold.

recipes.name: Broccoli Toast
directions: Steam or sauté broccoli until soft.
Mix with mashed avocado and a pinch of salt.
Spread over whole grain toast and sprinkle with chili flakes.

recipes.name: Broccoli Lentil Soup
directions: In a pot, combine chopped broccoli, cooked lentils, and vegetable broth.
Add garlic, cumin, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Blend until smooth or keep chunky as desired.

recipes.name: Broccoli Hummus Wrap
directions: Steam broccoli until tender.
Spread hummus on a whole wheat tortilla.
Add broccoli and shredded carrots, then roll tightly and slice.

recipes.name: Tofu Broccoli Stir-Fry
directions: Sauté tofu cubes until golden.
Add chopped broccoli and stir-fry until crisp-tender.
Pour in tamari or soy sauce and serve with brown rice.

recipes.name: Broccoli Egg Bake
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Whisk eggs with salt, pepper, and milk.
Stir in steamed broccoli and pour into a baking dish.
Bake for 15–18 minutes until set.

recipes.name: Broccoli Rice Bowl
directions: Mix steamed broccoli with warm brown rice.
Add pumpkin seeds and drizzle with lemon-tahini dressing.
Serve in a bowl for a wholesome lunch.

en.name: Brown Rice
en.short_description: Whole grain rice with the bran layer
en.long_description: Brown rice is a whole grain rice with the inedible outer hull removed but with the bran and germ layers intact, making it rich in fiber, vitamins, and minerals. It provides slow-digesting complex carbohydrates and is a staple in many healthy diets.

recipes.name: Brown Rice Bowl
directions: Cook brown rice according to package instructions.
Top with sautéed vegetables, tofu cubes, and drizzle with soy sauce.
Serve warm in a bowl.

recipes.name: Chicken Brown Rice Salad
directions: Mix cooked brown rice with shredded cooked chicken.
Add diced cucumbers, tomatoes, and lemon juice.
Chill and serve as a cold salad.

recipes.name: Lentil Rice Plate
directions: Cook lentils and season with turmeric and cumin.
Serve over cooked brown rice.
Top with sautéed onions and a dollop of yogurt if desired.

recipes.name: Veggie Rice Wrap
directions: Mix cooked brown rice with chopped veggies and hummus.
Spoon the mixture into a large lettuce leaf or tortilla.
Roll and enjoy as a wrap.

recipes.name: Spicy Tofu Rice Bowl
directions: Cook tofu with chili sauce until browned.
Place over a bowl of warm brown rice with sliced carrots and spinach.
Top with sesame seeds and serve.

recipes.name: Broccoli Rice Stir-Fry
directions: Sauté broccoli and garlic in olive oil until tender.
Add cooked brown rice and soy sauce.
Stir-fry for a few minutes until flavors combine.

recipes.name: Egg Rice Mix
directions: Scramble eggs in a pan with a pinch of salt and pepper.
Add cooked brown rice and mix well.
Sprinkle with green onions before serving.

recipes.name: Brown Rice with Pumpkin Seeds
directions: Mix cooked brown rice with roasted pumpkin seeds and diced cucumber.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

en.name: Tofu
en.short_description: High-protein soy-based plant food
en.long_description: Tofu is a versatile plant-based protein made from soybeans. It's low in calories and rich in essential amino acids, iron, and calcium, making it ideal for vegetarian and vegan diets.

recipes.name: Tofu Veggie Stir-Fry
directions: Cube tofu and sauté in olive oil until golden brown.
Add chopped bell peppers, broccoli, and carrots to the pan.
Pour in soy sauce and stir-fry until vegetables are tender.
Serve hot over brown rice or noodles.

recipes.name: Grilled Tofu Salad
directions: Slice tofu and grill on each side for 2-3 minutes.
Place over a bed of lettuce, cucumbers, and tomatoes.
Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette and serve.

recipes.name: Spicy Tofu Bowl
directions: Cook tofu with chili paste and garlic until browned.
Add cooked quinoa and steamed spinach to a bowl.
Top with the spicy tofu and sprinkle with sesame seeds.

recipes.name: Tofu Lentil Wrap
directions: Mash cooked lentils and combine with crumbled tofu.
Mix in diced onions, cumin, and salt.
Spoon mixture into a whole wheat wrap and roll tightly.

recipes.name: Tofu Brown Rice Bowl
directions: Cook tofu in sesame oil until crispy.
Serve over warm brown rice with shredded carrots and edamame.
Drizzle with teriyaki sauce and garnish with scallions.

recipes.name: Tofu Hummus Pita
directions: Sauté tofu slices in olive oil with garlic.
Spread hummus inside a pita and stuff with tofu, lettuce, and tomatoes.
Wrap tightly and serve warm or cold.

recipes.name: Tofu Quinoa Salad
directions: Combine cooked quinoa with sautéed tofu cubes.
Add chopped cucumbers, parsley, and a lemon-tahini dressing.
Toss everything together and chill before serving.

recipes.name: Tofu Sweet Potato Bowl
directions: Roast cubed sweet potatoes until tender.
Pan-fry tofu with paprika and garlic powder.
Layer tofu and sweet potatoes over greens and top with tahini dressing.

en.name: Cucumber
en.short_description: Refreshing green vegetable high in water content
en.long_description: Cucumbers are hydrating, low-calorie vegetables rich in antioxidants, vitamin K, and potassium. They aid in digestion, help keep you hydrated, and are perfect for light, healthy meals.

recipes.name: Cucumber Tomato Salad
directions: Slice cucumbers and tomatoes into bite-sized pieces.
Place in a bowl and add chopped red onion and parsley.
Drizzle with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Toss well and serve chilled.

recipes.name: Cucumber Avocado Wrap
directions: Mash avocado and spread on a whole grain wrap.
Layer with cucumber slices, lettuce, and grated carrots.
Roll the wrap tightly and slice in half to serve.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt Cucumber Bowl
directions: Mix diced cucumber with Greek yogurt in a bowl.
Add chopped mint and a pinch of salt.
Stir well and chill before serving as a side or dip.

recipes.name: Cucumber Lentil Salad
directions: In a bowl, combine cooked lentils and diced cucumber.
Add diced tomatoes and fresh herbs.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice and toss gently.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

recipes.name: Cucumber Chickpea Bowl
directions: Mix cooked chickpeas with diced cucumber, red bell pepper, and onions.
Add chopped parsley, salt, pepper, and a squeeze of lemon juice.
Toss to combine and chill before serving.

recipes.name: Hummus Cucumber Pita
directions: Spread hummus inside a whole wheat pita pocket.
Fill with sliced cucumbers, lettuce, and cherry tomatoes.
Sprinkle with paprika and enjoy immediately.

recipes.name: Cucumber Rice Bowl
directions: Add cooked brown rice to a bowl and top with sliced cucumbers and avocado.
Drizzle with soy sauce and sesame oil.
Sprinkle sesame seeds and serve chilled.

recipes.name: Cucumber Tofu Salad
directions: Cube tofu and lightly sauté in a pan until golden.
In a bowl, combine tofu with sliced cucumbers and shredded carrots.
Toss with soy sauce and sesame oil, then garnish with green onions.

en.name: Tomatoes
en.short_description: Juicy red fruit rich in antioxidants and vitamins
en.long_description: Tomatoes are a vibrant, juicy fruit packed with lycopene, vitamin C, and potassium. They support heart health, reduce inflammation, and add a refreshing flavor to various savory dishes.

recipes.name: Tomato Mozzarella Salad
directions: Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella into 1/4-inch thick rounds.
Arrange slices on a plate alternating between tomato and mozzarella.
Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Top with fresh basil leaves before serving.

recipes.name: Stuffed Tomatoes with Quinoa
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Cut tops off tomatoes and scoop out insides.
Cook quinoa and mix with chopped spinach, garlic, and herbs.
Stuff the tomatoes with the quinoa mixture and place in a baking dish.
Drizzle olive oil over the top and bake for 15 minutes until tender.

recipes.name: Chickpea Tomato Salad
directions: In a bowl, combine chickpeas, diced tomatoes, and chopped cucumber.
Add lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper to taste.
Stir well and top with chopped parsley before serving.

recipes.name: Grilled Tomato Sandwich
directions: Slice tomatoes and place between whole grain bread slices with cheese.
Butter the outside of the bread lightly.
Grill in a pan until bread is golden and cheese is melted.
Slice and serve warm.

recipes.name: Avocado Tomato Wrap
directions: Mash avocado and spread over a whole grain wrap.
Add sliced tomatoes and spinach leaves.
Roll up tightly and slice in half before serving.

recipes.name: Roasted Tomato Soup
directions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Halve tomatoes and place on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with olive oil and roast for 20 minutes.
Blend roasted tomatoes with vegetable broth and basil until smooth.
Heat in a saucepan and serve warm.

recipes.name: Egg and Tomato Bowl
directions: Boil eggs, peel and slice.
In a bowl, combine sliced eggs, tomatoes, and cucumber.
Top with salt, pepper, olive oil, and sprinkle with paprika.

recipes.name: Tofu Tomato Stir-Fry
directions: Cube tofu and sauté in a pan until golden.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
Season with soy sauce, garlic, and pepper.
Serve hot with brown rice or quinoa.

en.name: Tuna
en.short_description: High in protein and omega-3 fatty acids
en.long_description: Tuna is a lean source of high-quality protein and omega-3 fatty acids, supporting hormone balance, brain health, and muscle repair. It's great for an anti-inflammatory diet.

recipes.name: Grilled Tuna Steak
directions: Marinate the tuna steak with olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and herbs.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Grill tuna steak for 3-4 minutes on each side.
Serve hot with steamed vegetables.

recipes.name: Tuna Salad Bowl
directions: Mix canned tuna with Greek yogurt or light mayo.
Add chopped cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, and greens.
Drizzle with lemon juice and serve.

recipes.name: Tuna Quinoa Stir-fry
directions: Cook quinoa and set aside.
Sauté garlic, onions, and vegetables in olive oil.
Add tuna and quinoa, stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Tuna Zucchini Boats
directions: Cut zucchinis in half and scoop out centers.
Mix tuna with chopped veggies and fill boats.
Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.

recipes.name: Tuna Avocado Wrap
directions: Mash avocado and mix with tuna and seasonings.
Spread on whole wheat tortilla and wrap.
Serve chilled or grilled lightly.

recipes.name: Baked Tuna Patties
directions: Mix tuna, egg, oats, onion, and spices.
Form into patties and place on a baking tray.
Bake at 200°C for 20 minutes, flipping halfway.

recipes.name: Tuna Stuffed Bell Peppers
directions: Cut bell peppers in half and remove seeds.
Mix tuna, cooked rice, and veggies.
Fill peppers and bake at 190°C for 25 minutes.

recipes.name: Tuna Mushroom Pasta
directions: Cook whole wheat pasta and drain.
Sauté garlic and mushrooms in olive oil.
Add tuna and mix with cooked pasta.
Garnish with herbs and serve.

en.name: Lentils
en.short_description: High in protein and fiber, low in fat
en.long_description: Lentils are rich in plant-based protein, fiber, iron, and folate. They are excellent for muscle repair, gut health, and managing blood sugar. Ideal for vegetarians and those on an anti-inflammatory diet.

recipes.name: Spiced Lentil Soup
directions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in olive oil.
Add red lentils, cumin, turmeric, and vegetable broth.
Simmer for 20 minutes until lentils soften.
Blend or serve chunky with lemon juice.

recipes.name: Lentil Curry Bowl
directions: Cook lentils until soft.
In a pan, cook onions, tomatoes, and curry spices.
Mix in cooked lentils and simmer for 10 mins.
Serve with brown rice or quinoa.

recipes.name: Lentil Veggie Stir-fry
directions: Boil lentils and drain.
Stir-fry chopped vegetables in sesame oil.
Add lentils and soy sauce, cook for 5 mins.
Serve hot with lemon or herbs.

recipes.name: Baked Lentil Patties
directions: Blend cooked lentils with oats, onion, and spices.
Form into patties and place on a tray.
Bake at 200°C for 20 minutes.
Flip halfway through.

recipes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers with Lentils
directions: Cut bell peppers in half and remove seeds.
Mix lentils, rice, and veggies for stuffing.
Fill peppers and bake at 180°C for 25 mins.

recipes.name: Lentil Mushroom Biryani
directions: Cook lentils and basmati rice separately.
In a pan, sauté onion, garlic, mushrooms and biryani spices.
Layer rice and lentil mixture.
Steam together for 10 mins.

recipes.name: Lentil Spinach Dal
directions: Cook red lentils until soft.
Add spinach, turmeric, and garlic.
Simmer for 10 mins and temper with cumin seeds.
Serve with rice or roti.

recipes.name: Creamy Lentil Pasta
directions: Cook whole wheat pasta.
Blend cooked lentils with garlic and olive oil for sauce.
Mix sauce into pasta with herbs.
Top with cheese or chili flakes if desired.

en.name: Brown Rice
en.short_description: Whole grain rice high in fiber and nutrients
en.long_description: Brown rice is a whole grain that contains fiber, B-vitamins, magnesium, and antioxidants. It's slower-digesting than white rice, making it great for blood sugar control and weight management.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken with Brown Rice
directions: Marinate chicken with lemon, pepper, and garlic.
Grill chicken on medium heat until cooked.
Serve with steamed brown rice and sautéed veggies.

recipes.name: Veggie Fried Brown Rice
directions: Sauté garlic and onion in sesame oil.
Add chopped vegetables and cook 5 mins.
Stir in brown rice and soy sauce. Cook another 5 mins.

recipes.name: Brown Rice Lentil Khichdi
directions: Rinse and soak brown rice and lentils.
Cook with turmeric, cumin, and ginger.
Simmer until both rice and lentils are soft.

recipes.name: Chili Brown Rice Bowl
directions: Sauté onion, garlic, and bell pepper.
Add beans, chili powder, and tomato sauce.
Serve over brown rice with avocado.

recipes.name: Salmon Teriyaki with Brown Rice
directions: Pan-fry salmon with teriyaki sauce.
Cook brown rice separately.
Plate with steamed broccoli or greens.

recipes.name: Stuffed Peppers with Brown Rice
directions: Mix cooked rice with vegetables and herbs.
Stuff into halved bell peppers.
Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.

recipes.name: Chicken & Brown Rice Stir-fry
directions: Sauté chicken slices with garlic and soy sauce.
Add cooked brown rice and veggies.
Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until well mixed.

recipes.name: Brown Rice Buddha Bowl
directions: Layer bowl with rice, beans, and veggies.
Drizzle tahini or lemon dressing.
Top with seeds or nuts if desired.

en.name: Avocado
en.short_description: Creamy fruit rich in healthy fats
en.long_description: Avocados are packed with heart-healthy monounsaturated fats, fiber, potassium, and antioxidants. Great for digestion, skin health, and keeping you full longer.

recipes.name: Avocado Chicken Salad
directions: Dice cooked chicken and avocado.
Mix with yogurt, lemon, salt, and pepper.
Serve over greens or whole grain toast.

recipes.name: Avocado Quinoa Bowl
directions: Cook quinoa and let cool slightly.
Mix in chopped avocado, corn, and black beans.
Drizzle with lime and olive oil dressing.

recipes.name: Stuffed Avocado with Tuna
directions: Mix tuna with mustard, lemon, and herbs.
Halve avocado and remove seed.
Stuff each half with tuna mix and serve.

recipes.name: Avocado & Egg Brown Rice Bowl
directions: Cook brown rice and keep warm.
Fry or poach an egg.
Add sliced avocado and egg over rice.

recipes.name: Avocado & Lentil Salad
directions: Boil and cool lentils.
Mix with chopped avocado, tomato, and onion.
Add olive oil and lemon dressing.

recipes.name: Avocado Veggie Wrap
directions: Spread mashed avocado on whole grain wrap.
Add spinach, cucumber, and shredded carrot.
Roll and cut into halves or slices.

recipes.name: Grilled Shrimp & Avocado Bowl
directions: Grill shrimp with garlic and lemon.
Serve over brown rice with sliced avocado.
Top with sesame seeds and herbs.

recipes.name: Avocado Chickpea Dinner Bowl
directions: Roast chickpeas with paprika and cumin.
Add to a bowl with brown rice and avocado.
Top with yogurt dressing or tahini.

en.name: Zucchini
en.short_description: Low-calorie, nutrient-rich summer squash
en.long_description: Zucchini is a low-calorie vegetable rich in vitamin C, potassium, and antioxidants. Great for digestion and supports healthy metabolism.

recipes.name: Zucchini Noodle Bowl
directions: Spiralize zucchini into noodles.
Sauté in olive oil with garlic for 3–4 mins.
Top with grilled chicken or tofu and serve.

recipes.name: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
directions: Halve zucchini and scoop out center.
Stuff with lentils, onion, and tomato mix.
Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.

recipes.name: Zucchini Stir Fry
directions: Slice zucchini into thin rounds.
Stir fry with bell peppers, soy sauce, and garlic.
Serve hot with brown rice.

recipes.name: Zucchini Egg Scramble
directions: Grate zucchini and squeeze out moisture.
Sauté and mix in scrambled eggs.
Add herbs and serve hot.

recipes.name: Zucchini Quinoa Bowl
directions: Cook quinoa and let cool slightly.
Mix with grilled zucchini, chickpeas, and herbs.
Drizzle with lemon and olive oil.

recipes.name: Zucchini Lentil Curry
directions: Cook red lentils until soft.
Add chopped zucchini and spices.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve.

recipes.name: Zucchini Tuna Bake
directions: Grate zucchini and mix with tuna and egg.
Pour into baking dish and bake at 180°C for 20 mins.
Let cool slightly and serve.

recipes.name: Grilled Zucchini Chickpea Wrap
directions: Grill zucchini slices until tender.
Mash chickpeas with lemon and cumin.
Wrap both in whole grain wrap.

en.name: Sweet Corn
en.short_description: Sweet, juicy corn kernels full of fiber and antioxidants
en.long_description: Sweet corn is a good source of fiber, vitamins (especially B-complex), and antioxidants. It's filling, versatile, and adds natural sweetness to meals.

recipes.name: Corn Vegetable Soup
directions: Boil corn, carrot, and beans together.
Add salt, pepper, and a bit of corn flour slurry.
Simmer for 10 mins and serve warm.

recipes.name: Corn Quinoa Bowl
directions: Cook quinoa until fluffy.
Add boiled sweet corn, lemon juice, and herbs.
Mix well and serve chilled or warm.

recipes.name: Corn Zucchini Stir Fry
directions: Stir fry chopped zucchini and corn with garlic.
Add salt, pepper, and a sprinkle of chili flakes.
Serve with brown rice or on its own.

recipes.name: Corn Lentil Patties
directions: Mix mashed lentils and boiled corn with spices.
Shape into small patties.
Pan-fry both sides until golden.

recipes.name: Corn and Egg Scramble
directions: Beat eggs and add a pinch of salt.
Scramble with sweet corn and onions.
Serve hot with toast or salad.

recipes.name: Corn Tuna Wrap
directions: Mix tuna with corn and a little yogurt.
Wrap in whole grain tortilla.
Grill or toast lightly before serving.

recipes.name: Corn Brown Rice Pilaf
directions: Cook brown rice.
Stir in boiled corn, spices, and green peas.
Serve with lemon wedge.

recipes.name: Corn Avocado Salad
directions: Mix boiled corn, chopped avocado, and tomato.
Drizzle lemon juice and add black pepper.
Serve fresh as a light dinner.

en.name: Cauliflower
en.short_description: Low-carb, high-fiber cruciferous vegetable
en.long_description: Cauliflower is rich in fiber, vitamins C and K, and antioxidants. It's low in calories and carbs, making it ideal for weight management and diabetic-friendly meals.

recipes.name: Cauliflower Rice Bowl
directions: Grate cauliflower to make rice texture.
Sauté with garlic, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Add steamed veggies or grilled tofu on top.

recipes.name: Cauliflower Curry
directions: Fry onion, garlic, and ginger.
Add cauliflower florets and curry spices.
Simmer with tomato puree until soft.

recipes.name: Cauliflower Patties
directions: Boil and mash cauliflower.
Mix with spices and breadcrumbs.
Shape into patties and pan-fry.

recipes.name: Cauliflower Soup
directions: Boil cauliflower with garlic and onion.
Blend into a smooth soup.
Add salt, pepper, and herbs to taste.

recipes.name: Cauliflower & Lentil Mix
directions: Cook red lentils and cauliflower together.
Add turmeric, cumin, and salt.
Simmer until thick and serve hot.

recipes.name: Cauliflower Stir Fry
directions: Stir fry cauliflower with onion and garlic.
Add chili flakes and lemon juice.
Serve with brown rice or alone.

recipes.name: Cauliflower Avocado Salad
directions: Roast cauliflower lightly.
Mix with diced avocado and herbs.
Drizzle with lemon juice and serve.

recipes.name: Cauliflower Tuna Wrap
directions: Mix roasted cauliflower with tuna and yogurt.
Wrap in lettuce or flatbread.
Serve with chili sauce or fresh herbs.

en.name: Chicken Breast
en.short_description: Lean protein that supports muscle repair and weight control
en.long_description: Chicken breast is a low-fat, high-protein meat that supports muscle building, tissue repair, and overall satiety. It's ideal for those aiming to manage weight or build lean mass.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Breast
directions: Marinate chicken with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper.
Grill both sides until cooked through.
Serve with steamed vegetables or brown rice.

recipes.name: Chicken & Broccoli Stir Fry
directions: Slice chicken and stir fry with garlic.
Add broccoli and soy sauce.
Cook until chicken is done and broccoli is tender-crisp.

recipes.name: Baked Chicken with Veggies
directions: Season chicken with herbs and olive oil.
Place with carrots, zucchini, and bell peppers in baking dish.
Bake at 180°C for 25-30 minutes.

recipes.name: Chicken Avocado Salad
directions: Grill chicken and slice it.
Toss with avocado, lettuce, and olive oil dressing.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Chicken Quinoa Bowl
directions: Cook quinoa separately.
Grill and slice chicken.
Combine with quinoa, corn, beans, and avocado.

recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Chicken
directions: Sear chicken with garlic and olive oil.
Add lemon juice and cover to cook.
Serve with roasted sweet potato.

recipes.name: Spicy Chicken Wrap
directions: Cook chicken with chili flakes and paprika.
Add to whole wheat wrap with lettuce.
Roll and serve with yogurt dip.

recipes.name: Chicken & Mushroom Skillet
directions: Sauté chicken with garlic.
Add sliced mushrooms and cook together.
Season and simmer for 10 minutes.

en.name: Beets
en.short_description: Rich in nitrates and antioxidants, supports blood flow
en.long_description: Beets are rich in natural nitrates that help improve blood flow and lower blood pressure. They also contain powerful antioxidants and fiber that support digestion and detoxification.

recipes.name: Roasted Beet Salad
directions: Peel and cube beets.
Roast in oven at 200°C with olive oil for 20 mins.
Toss with arugula, feta, and balsamic dressing.

recipes.name: Beet & Quinoa Bowl
directions: Cook quinoa and set aside.
Roast beets and chop finely.
Mix with chickpeas, greens, and lemon dressing.

recipes.name: Beetroot Cutlets
directions: Grate cooked beets and mix with mashed potatoes.
Add spices, form patties.
Pan-fry until crisp on both sides.

recipes.name: Beet & Carrot Soup
directions: Boil beets and carrots until soft.
Blend with garlic, onion, and spices.
Simmer and serve hot with a toast.

en.name: Edamame
en.short_description: High in plant protein and fiber, perfect for healthy dinners
en.long_description: Edamame are young soybeans packed with plant-based protein, fiber, and essential nutrients. They support heart health, digestion, and muscle recovery, making them perfect for balanced dinner meals.

recipes.name: Garlic Edamame
directions: Boil edamame pods for 5 mins.
Toss with sautéed garlic, olive oil, and a pinch of salt.
Serve hot as a savory snack or side.

recipes.name: Edamame Fried Rice
directions: Cook brown rice and keep aside.
Stir-fry onions, carrots, and edamame.
Add rice, soy sauce, and scramble in 1 egg (optional).

recipes.name: Edamame Pasta
directions: Boil pasta and drain.
Blend edamame with garlic, basil, olive oil to make pesto.
Toss pasta in edamame pesto and serve.

recipes.name: Edamame Quinoa Bowl
directions: Cook quinoa and keep aside.
Add steamed edamame, cherry tomatoes, and greens.
Drizzle lemon tahini dressing and serve.

recipes.name: Spicy Edamame
directions: Steam edamame pods.
Toss with chili flakes, soy sauce, and sesame oil.
Serve hot for a spicy bite.

en.name: Mushrooms
en.short_description: Low-calorie, rich in umami flavor and nutrients
en.long_description: Mushrooms are low in calories but packed with antioxidants, fiber, and B vitamins. They help support the immune system and offer a meaty texture, perfect for vegetarian dinners or healthy low-fat meals.

recipes.name: Garlic Mushroom Stir-Fry
directions: Sauté mushrooms in olive oil until browned.
Add garlic, salt, and pepper.
Cook for 5 more minutes and serve.

recipes.name: Mushroom Quinoa Bowl
directions: Cook quinoa separately.
Sauté mushrooms, spinach, and onions.
Mix with quinoa and drizzle lemon juice.

recipes.name: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
directions: Boil pasta and drain.
Cook mushrooms with garlic in butter.
Add milk/cream and toss with pasta.

recipes.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
directions: Remove stems from mushrooms.
Mix bread crumbs, garlic, and herbs as filling.
Fill mushrooms and bake for 15 minutes.

recipes.name: Mushroom Soup
directions: Cook mushrooms, onions, and garlic in a pot.
Add vegetable broth and simmer.
Blend for a creamy soup.

ar.name: بذور الشيا
ar.short_description: غنية بالألياف وأوميغا 3 لدعم الهضم وصحة القلب
ar.long_description: بذور الشيا هي بذور صغيرة غنية بالعناصر الغذائية، تحتوي على الألياف، وأحماض أوميغا 3 الدهنية، والبروتين، ومضادات الأكسدة. تدعم الهضم، وتحسن صحة القلب، وتساعد في الحفاظ على مستويات الطاقة طوال اليوم.

recipes.name: بودينغ الشيا بحليب اللوز
directions: اخلط بذور الشيا وحليب اللوز في وعاء أو برطمان.
أضف شراب القيقب والفانيليا.
ضعه في الثلاجة لمدة 4 ساعات على الأقل أو طوال الليل حتى يتماسك.

recipes.name: سموثي بذور الشيا
directions: اخلط جميع المكونات معاً حتى يصبح المزيج ناعماً.
قدمه بارداً.

recipes.name: شوفان الشيا المنقوع طوال الليل
directions: اخلط الشوفان، بذور الشيا، الحليب، والمحلي في برطمان.
حرك جيداً وضعه في الثلاجة طوال الليل.
أضف الفواكه قبل التقديم.

recipes.name: مربى الشيا بالتوت
directions: اطبخ التوت في قدر حتى يصبح طرياً.
اهرسه وأضف بذور الشيا.
برده وضعه في الثلاجة لمدة ساعة ليصبح متماسكاً.

recipes.name: فطائر الموز وبذور الشيا
directions: اهرسي الموز وامزجه مع البيض، الشوفان، بذور الشيا، والقرفة.
اطبخ على مقلاة غير لاصقة حتى يصبح ذهبي الجانبين.

recipes.name: زبادي يوناني مع الشيا
directions: اخلط الزبادي اليوناني مع بذور الشيا.
زينيه بالفواكه ورش العسل.

recipes.name: بارفيه المانجو وبذور الشيا
directions: اخلط المانجو حتى تصبح مهروسة.
رتب بودينغ الشيا وهرس المانجو في كأس.
زيني برقائق جوز الهند.

recipes.name: مافن بديل البيض ببذور الشيا
directions: اخلط بذور الشيا مع الماء لصنع بديل البيض.
امزج مع الدقيق، الموز، مسحوق الخبز، والقرفة.
صب الخليط في قوالب المافن واخبز عند 350°F لمدة 15-20 دقيقة.

ar.name: الزبادي اليوناني
ar.short_description: غني بالبروتين والبروبيوتيك لصحة الأمعاء والعضلات
ar.long_description: الزبادي اليوناني غني بالبروتين والكالسيوم والبروبيوتيك التي تدعم صحة الأمعاء، وتساعد في الهضم، وتعزز تعافي العضلات. وهو قاعدة متعددة الاستخدامات للوجبات الحلوة والمالحة.

recipes.name: بارفيه الزبادي اليوناني
directions: رتب الزبادي، الجرانولا، والتوت في كوب.
أضف العسل وقدمه بارداً.

recipes.name: وعاء الزبادي بالعسل
directions: ضع الزبادي في وعاء ورش عليه العسل.
أضف المكسرات ورشة قرفة.

recipes.name: سموثي الزبادي بالتوت
directions: اخلط الزبادي، التوت، الموز، والحليب حتى يصبح المزيج ناعماً.
قدمه بارداً.

recipes.name: زبادي يوناني مع جرانولا
directions: اخلط الزبادي اليوناني مع الجرانولا والفواكه الطازجة.
قدمها فوراً.

recipes.name: الزبادي مع بذور الشيا للإفطار
directions: اخلط بذور الشيا مع الزبادي واتركه 5 دقائق.
زينه بالفواكه ورش عليه شراب القيقب.

recipes.name: زبادي مالح مع الخيار
directions: اخلط الزبادي مع الخيار المبشور والملح والأعشاب.
قدمها كغموس أو طبق جانبي.

recipes.name: قطع الزبادي المجمدة
directions: ضع الزبادي في قوالب مكعبات الثلج أو قوالب أخرى.
أضف الفواكه واحتفظ بها في الفريزر لمدة ساعتين.

recipes.name: فطائر البروتين بالزبادي
directions: اخلط الزبادي، البيض، الشوفان، ومسحوق الخبز لصنع خليط الفطائر.
اطبخ في المقلاة حتى يتحول للون الذهبي على الجانبين.

ar.name: موز
ar.short_description: غني بالبوتاسيوم والألياف، مثالي للطاقة والهضم
ar.long_description: الموز فاكهة متعددة الاستخدامات وغنية بالعناصر الغذائية توفر طاقة سريعة، تدعم صحة الجهاز الهضمي، وهي مصدر طبيعي للبوتاسيوم. مثالي للوجبات قبل أو بعد التمرين.

recipes.name: فطائر الشوفان بالموز
directions: اهرسي الموز واخلطيه مع الشوفان، البيض، ومسحوق الخبز لتشكيل خليط.
اطبخي في مقلاة غير لاصقة حتى يتحول إلى اللون الذهبي على الجانبين.

recipes.name: توست بالموز وزبدة الفول السوداني
directions: ادهني زبدة الفول السوداني على التوست وضعي شرائح الموز فوقه.
رشي القرفة أو بذور الشيا إذا رغبت.

recipes.name: سموثي الموز
directions: اخلطي الموز مع الحليب، الزبادي، وقليل من العسل حتى يصبح المزيج ناعماً.
قدميه بارداً.

recipes.name: شوفان الموز المخبوز
directions: اخلطي الموز المهروس مع الشوفان، الحليب، والقرفة وصبي الخليط في طبق خبز.
اخبزيه في فرن بدرجة حرارة 180 مئوية (350 فهرنهايت) لمدة 20 دقيقة حتى يتماسك.

recipes.name: بودينغ الموز وبذور الشيا
directions: اخلطي الموز مع الحليب وأضيفي بذور الشيا.
برديه في الثلاجة لمدة ساعتين أو طوال الليل حتى يتماسك.

recipes.name: مصاصات الموز المجمدة
directions: أدخلي أعواداً في نصف موزة، اغمسها في الزبادي ولفيها بالجرانولا.
جمّديها لمدة ساعتين على الأقل.

recipes.name: وعاء الموز والزبادي
directions: اخلطي شرائح الموز مع الزبادي وزينيه بالمكسرات أو البذور.
قدميه طازجاً.

recipes.name: مافن البروتين بالموز
directions: اخلطي الموز المهروس مع الشوفان، مسحوق البروتين، البيض، ومسحوق الخبز.
صبّي الخليط في قوالب المافن واخبزيها في فرن بدرجة حرارة 180 مئوية (350 فهرنهايت) لمدة 20 دقيقة.

ar.name: الشوفان
ar.short_description: غني بالألياف والكربوهيدرات بطيئة الهضم لدعم الطاقة والهضم
ar.long_description: الشوفان هو حبوب كاملة مليئة بالألياف القابلة للذوبان، خاصة البيتا جلوكان، الذي يساعد على خفض الكوليسترول ويدعم صحة القلب والجهاز الهضمي. يوفر طاقة مستمرة — مثالي للإفطار والوجبات قبل التمرين.

recipes.name: شوفان منقوع طوال الليل
directions: اخلط الشوفان، الحليب، بذور الشيا، والعسل في برطمان.
برده طوال الليل وزينه بالفواكه قبل التقديم.

recipes.name: شوفان مع الفواكه
directions: اطبخ الشوفان مع الماء أو الحليب حتى يصبح طرياً.
زينه بشرائح الفواكه والمكسرات.

recipes.name: فطائر الشوفان والموز
directions: اخلط الشوفان، الموز، البيض، ومسحوق الخبز لصنع خليط.
اطبخ الفطائر في مقلاة غير لاصقة.

recipes.name: ألواح الشوفان والمكسرات
directions: اخلط الشوفان، المكسرات، العسل، وزبدة المكسرات في وعاء.
اضغط الخليط في صينية وبرّد حتى يتماسك.

recipes.name: سموثي الشوفان
directions: اخلط الشوفان، الموز، الحليب، وزبدة الفول السوداني حتى يصبح ناعماً.
قدمه بارداً.

recipes.name: وعاء الشوفان المالح
directions: اطبخ الشوفان في الماء وأضف الملح والأعشاب.
زينه بالخضار المطبوخة وبيضة مسلوقة.

recipes.name: أكواب الشوفان المخبوزة
directions: اخلط الشوفان، الحليب، البيض، الموز، والقرفة في وعاء.
ضع الخليط في قوالب المافن واخبز حتى يتماسك.

recipes.name: كرات الطاقة بالشوفان وبذور الشيا
directions: اخلط الشوفان، بذور الشيا، زبدة الفول السوداني، والعسل.
شكّل كرات وبرّدها.

ar.name: زبدة اللوز
ar.short_description: غنية بالدهون الصحية والبروتين لطاقة تدوم
ar.long_description: زبدة اللوز هي معجون غني بالمغذيات يحتوي على الدهون الأحادية غير المشبعة، البروتين، فيتامين هـ، والمغنيسيوم. تدعم صحة القلب، توفر طاقة مستمرة، ومثالية للوجبات والوجبات الخفيفة عالية البروتين.

recipes.name: توست بزبدة اللوز
directions: حمص شرائح الخبز
افرد زبدة اللوز وزين بالموز أو التوت

recipes.name: سموثي الموز وزبدة اللوز
directions: اخلط الموز، زبدة اللوز، الحليب، والشوفان حتى يصبح ناعماً
قدمه بارداً

recipes.name: شوفان بزبدة اللوز
directions: اطبخ الشوفان وحرك زبدة اللوز والقرفة
زينه بالفواكه والبذور

recipes.name: شرائح التفاح مع زبدة اللوز
directions: قطع التفاح وافرد زبدة اللوز
رشه بالقرفة إذا رغبت

recipes.name: كرات البروتين بزبدة اللوز
directions: اخلط زبدة اللوز، الشوفان، العسل، وبروتين البودرة
شكّل كرات وبرّدها

recipes.name: لفافة زبدة اللوز والعسل
directions: افرد زبدة اللوز والعسل على لفافة حبوب كاملة
لفها واستمتع بها

recipes.name: وعاء الزبادي بزبدة اللوز
directions: اخلط زبدة اللوز مع الزبادي
زينه بالجرانولا والفواكه

recipes.name: ساندويتش الموز وزبدة اللوز
directions: افرد زبدة اللوز على الخبز وأضف شرائح الموز
غطّ بقطعة خبز أخرى وقدمه

ar.name: التوت
ar.short_description: غني بمضادات الأكسدة وحلو المذاق طبيعياً
ar.long_description: التوت منخفض السعرات وغني بالألياف والفيتامينات ومضادات الأكسدة. يدعم صحة القلب، يحسن مستويات السكر في الدم، ومثالي للوجبات الغنية بالبروتين والمنعشة.

recipes.name: وعاء سموزي التوت
directions: اخلط التوت المجمد، الموز، والزبادي حتى يصبح ناعماً
صب في وعاء وزينه بالجرانولا والفواكه الطازجة

recipes.name: التوت مع الزبادي والعسل
directions: اخلط التوت مع الزبادي
أضف العسل وقدمه

recipes.name: الشوفان مع التوت المشكل
directions: اطبخ الشوفان وحرك القرفة
زين بالتوت المشكل ورشة من الحليب

recipes.name: بودينغ الشيا بالتوت
directions: اخلط بذور الشيا، الحليب، والتوت
برّد طوال الليل وقدمه بارداً

recipes.name: زبادي التوت المجمد
directions: افرد الزبادي على صينية خبز
وزع التوت وادخلها الفريزر حتى تتجمد، ثم اكسرها لقطع

recipes.name: فطائر التوت
directions: حضّر خليط الفطائر واطوِ التوت فيه
اطبخها على مقلاة وقدّمها مع شراب القيقب

recipes.name: سموثي التوت والموز
directions: اخلط التوت، الموز، والحليب حتى يصبح ناعماً
قدمه بارداً

recipes.name: التوت مع جبنة القريش
directions: ضع جبنة القريش في وعاء
زينها بالتوت الطازج واستمتع

ar.name: بذور الكتان
ar.short_description: غني بالألياف وأوميغا-3
ar.long_description: بذور الكتان مصدر نباتي للأحماض الدهنية أوميغا-3 والألياف. تدعم صحة الجهاز الهضمي وتحافظ على صحة القلب، مما يجعلها إضافة غذائية قوية للإفطار.

recipes.name: سموثي بذور الكتان
directions: اخلط الموز، الحليب، وبذور الكتان حتى يصبح ناعماً
قدمه بارداً

recipes.name: شوفان ببذور الكتان
directions: اطبخ الشوفان وحرك بذور الكتان والقرفة
زين بالتوت وقدمه

recipes.name: مفن بذور الكتان
directions: اخلط خليط المفن وأضف بذور الكتان
اخبز على حرارة 350 فهرنهايت لمدة 20 دقيقة

recipes.name: زبادي مع بذور الكتان والفواكه
directions: حرّك بذور الكتان في الزبادي
زين بالفواكه المقطعة وقدمه

recipes.name: فطائر الموز ببذور الكتان
directions: اخلط الموز المهروس، البيض، الشوفان، وبذور الكتان
اطبخ في المقلاة حتى تتحمر

recipes.name: شوفان ليل مع بذور الكتان والشيا
directions: اخلط الشوفان، الحليب، بذور الكتان، وبذور الشيا
برده طوال الليل وزينه بالفواكه

recipes.name: كرات طاقة بذور الكتان والمكسرات
directions: اخلط بذور الكتان، الشوفان، زبدة الفول السوداني، والعسل
شكل كرات وبرّدها

recipes.name: وعاء إفطار بالتفاح وبذور الكتان
directions: اخلط التفاح المقطع، بذور الكتان، والزبادي
رش القرفة وقدمه

ar.name: بيضة مسلوقة
ar.short_description: غنية بالبروتين ومتعددة الاستخدامات
ar.long_description: البيض المسلوق مصدر سريع ومغذي للبروتين عالي الجودة والدهون الصحية. يساعد على بناء العضلات، دعم التحكم في الوزن، والشعور بالشبع طوال الصباح.

recipes.name: توست بالبيض المسلوق المقطع
directions: حمص الخبز وضع شرائح البيض المسلوق فوقه
تبّل بالملح والفلفل وقدمه

recipes.name: لفائف سلطة البيض
directions: اخلط البيض المسلوق المقطع مع الزبادي والخردل
املأ لفائف القمح الكامل ولفها

recipes.name: وعاء البيض المسلوق والأفوكادو
directions: قطع البيضة المسلوقة والأفوكادو وضعهما في وعاء
أضف زيت الزيتون والفلفل وعصير الليمون

recipes.name: ساندويتش البيض والخضروات
directions: ضع شرائح البيض المسلوق والخضروات فوق الخبز
غطّها بشريحة أخرى وقدّم الساندويتش

recipes.name: بيضة مسلوقة مع الحمص
directions: قطع البيضة المسلوقة إلى نصفين وقدّمها مع الحمص جانباً
رش البابريكا واستمتع

recipes.name: طبق البيض والجبن القريش
directions: رتّب شرائح البيض والجبن القريش في طبق
تبّل بالأعشاب والفلفل الأسود

recipes.name: وعاء البيض والسبانخ البسيط
directions: اخلط شرائح البيض المسلوق مع السبانخ المطهو على البخار
رش زيت الزيتون وقدمه

recipes.name: مفن البيض والشوفان المالح
directions: اخلط الشوفان، البيض، الخضروات، واخبز في قوالب المافن على حرارة 350 فهرنهايت لمدة 15 دقيقة
برد وقدّم

ar.name: جبن قريش
ar.short_description: منتج ألبان منخفض الدهون وعالي البروتين
ar.long_description: جبن القريش غني بالبروتين وقليل الدهون، مما يجعله خيارًا ممتازًا لفطور صحي. يدعم نمو العضلات، ويساعد في التحكم بالوزن، ويتماشى جيدًا مع المكونات الحلوة والمالحة.

recipes.name: وعاء جبن قريش مع التوت
directions: ضع جبن القريش في وعاء
أضف التوت المختلط الطازج وقدمه

recipes.name: توست جبن القريش
directions: حمص الخبز وادهنه بجبن القريش
أضف الطماطم أو التوت على الوجه

recipes.name: سموثي جبن القريش والموز
directions: اخلط جبن القريش والموز والحليب والعسل حتى يصبح المزيج ناعمًا
قدم المزيج باردًا

recipes.name: وعاء جبن قريش المالح
directions: اخلط جبن القريش مع الخضروات المقطعة والأعشاب
رش زيت الزيتون وقدمه

recipes.name: شوفان مع جبن القريش
directions: اطبخ الشوفان وحرّك فيه جبن القريش قبل التقديم
أضف الفاكهة أو القرفة للوجه

recipes.name: سلطة الفاكهة وجبن القريش
directions: اخلط الفواكه المقطعة مع جبن القريش
زيّن بالنعناع أو رشة عسل

recipes.name: جبن القريش مع المكسرات والعسل
directions: ضع المكسرات المفرومة على جبن القريش
رُشّ العسل وقدّم

recipes.name: لفائف جبن القريش المخفوقة
directions: اخفق البيض مع جبن القريش والخضروات
لفّها في تورتيلا وقدّم

ar.name: الأفوكادو
ar.short_description: فاكهة كريمية غنية بالدهون الصحية
ar.long_description: الأفوكادو غني بالمغذيات ومليء بالدهون الأحادية غير المشبعة الصحية، والألياف، والفيتامينات الأساسية. يعزز صحة القلب، ويحسن الهضم، ويضيف قوامًا كريميًا ونكهة للوجبات.

recipes.name: توست الأفوكادو
directions: حمص الخبز واهرس الأفوكادو على الوجه
رش الملح والفلفل ورقائق الفلفل الحار اختيارياً

recipes.name: وعاء البيض والأفوكادو
directions: قطع البيض المسلوق والأفوكادو إلى شرائح وضعها في وعاء
رش زيت الزيتون وتبّل حسب الرغبة

recipes.name: سموثي الأفوكادو والموز
directions: اخلط الأفوكادو والموز والحليب والعسل حتى يصبح المزيج ناعماً
قدم المزيج بارداً

recipes.name: سلطة الأفوكادو والتوت
directions: اخلط الأفوكادو المقطع مع التوت المختلط
قلّب مع عصير الليمون وقدّم

recipes.name: توست الأفوكادو وجبن القريش
directions: حمص الخبز وضع فوقه شرائح جبن القريش والأفوكادو
تبّل بالفلفل الأسود

recipes.name: أفوكادو محشو بالتونة
directions: اقسم الأفوكادو إلى نصفين واملأه بسلطة التونة
قدمه مع ملعقة أو فوق الخضروات الورقية

recipes.name: فطائر الشوفان والأفوكادو
directions: اخلط الشوفان، البيض، الأفوكادو، والحليب لصنع خليط
اطبخ الفطائر على المقلاة حتى تتحمر

recipes.name: لفافة الأفوكادو والحمص
directions: ادهن الحمص على اللفافة وضع شرائح الأفوكادو فوقها
لفّ وقدّم طازجًا

ar.name: بذور دوار الشمس
ar.short_description: بذور مقرمشة غنية بالدهون الصحية وفيتامين E
ar.long_description: بذور دوار الشمس مصدر ممتاز للدهون الصحية، وفيتامين E، والسيلينيوم. تدعم وظيفة المناعة، وصحة الجلد، وتضيف قرمشة ونكهة جوزية شهية للوجبات.

recipes.name: جرانولا بذور دوار الشمس
directions: اخلط الشوفان، وبذور دوار الشمس، والعسل، والزيت
اخبز حتى يصبح ذهبيًا ومقرمشًا

recipes.name: زبادي مع بذور دوار الشمس
directions: ضع بذور دوار الشمس والفواكه على الزبادي
رُشّ العسل إذا رغبت

recipes.name: شوفان مع قرمشة بذور دوار الشمس
directions: اطبخ الشوفان وضع فوقه بذور دوار الشمس والقرفة
أضف الفواكه أو المكسرات حسب الرغبة

recipes.name: توست الأفوكادو مع البذور
directions: ضع الأفوكادو المهروس على التوست
رُشّ بذور دوار الشمس والتوابل

recipes.name: مفن الموز وبذور دوار الشمس
directions: اخلط الموز المهروس، والدقيق، والبذور، ومكونات الخبز
اخبز حتى يتحول إلى اللون الذهبي

recipes.name: سموثي التوت مع البذور
directions: اخلط التوت، والزبادي، والحليب، وبذور دوار الشمس
قدم المزيج باردًا

recipes.name: كرات بذور دوار الشمس والكتان
directions: اخلط بذور دوار الشمس، وبذور الكتان، وزبدة المكسرات، والعسل
شكل كرات وضعها في الثلاجة

recipes.name: وعاء الإفطار بالبيض والبذور
directions: قطع البيض المسلوق وادمجه مع الأفوكادو وبذور دوار الشمس
قدمه في وعاء مع الملح والفلفل

ar.name: كيوي
ar.short_description: فاكهة خضراء حامضة غنية بفيتامين C والألياف
ar.long_description: الكيوي فاكهة لاذعة محملة بفيتامين C، ومضادات الأكسدة، والألياف الغذائية. يدعم وظيفة المناعة، والهضم، ويضيف نكهة منعشة لأطباق الإفطار الحلوة والمالحة.

recipes.name: وعاء الكيوي مع الزبادي
directions: قطّع الكيوي وضعه فوق الزبادي
ضع الجرانولا أو البذور على الوجه

recipes.name: بارفيه الكيوي مع الشيا
directions: ضع طبقات من بودينغ الشيا والكيوي المقطع والزبادي
برّد وقدم

recipes.name: سموثي الكيوي والموز
directions: اخلط الكيوي، والموز، والزبادي حتى يصبح ناعمًا
أضف العسل إذا رغبت

recipes.name: كيوي مع جبن القريش
directions: ضع شرائح الكيوي على جبن القريش
رُشّ العسل أو أضف المكسرات

recipes.name: وعاء الشوفان بالكيوي
directions: اطبخ الشوفان وأضف الكيوي والبذور
رُشّ شراب القيقب إذا رغبت

recipes.name: سلطة الكيوي والتوت
directions: اخلط الكيوي المقطع مع التوت في وعاء
أضف عصير الليمون أو النعناع

recipes.name: توست الجبن الكريمي مع الكيوي
directions: افرد الجبن الكريمي على التوست وضع شرائح الكيوي
رُشّ القليل من العسل

recipes.name: بودينغ الشيا مع الكيوي
directions: حضّر بودينغ الشيا وضع شرائح الكيوي فوقه
برده واستمتع

ar.name: سبانخ
ar.short_description: خضار ورقية غنية بالحديد والفيتامينات ومضادات الأكسدة.
ar.long_description: السبانخ نبات ورقي غني بالمغذيات يدعم صحة الجلد والشعر والعظام. يُعد مكونًا متعدد الاستخدامات مثاليًا للسلطات، واللفائف، والقلي السريع، وأطباق الأرز، مما يجعله خيارًا ممتازًا لغداء متوازن.

recipes.name: سلطة السبانخ والحمص
directions: اشطف الحمص وصفيه.
في وعاء، اخلط السبانخ الطازجة، والحمص، والخيار المفروم، والطماطم الكرزية.
رش زيت الزيتون وعصير الليمون. قلب المزيج وقدم.

recipes.name: وعاء الكينوا مع السبانخ
directions: اطبخ الكينوا حسب التعليمات.
قلّب السبانخ في زيت الزيتون حتى تذبل.
اخلط الكينوا والسبانخ مع بيضة مسلوقة في وعاء.
تبّل بالفلفل الأسود والقليل من الملح.

recipes.name: لفائف التوفو مع السبانخ
directions: اقلِ مكعبات التوفو بزيت الزيتون والبابريكا حتى تصبح ذهبية.
ضع لفافة من خبز الحبوب الكاملة، وأضف السبانخ، والتوفو، والحمص.
لفها بإحكام واقطعها إلى نصفين للتقديم.

recipes.name: شوربة العدس بالسبانخ
directions: في قدر، اقلي الثوم والبصل بزيت الزيتون.
أضف العدس ومرق الخضار واتركه يغلي.
خفف الحرارة، أضف السبانخ، واتركه يُطهى حتى ينضج العدس.
تبّل بالملح والفلفل قبل التقديم.

recipes.name: أرز بني مع السبانخ والفطر
directions: اطبخ الأرز البني واتركه جانبًا.
اقلِ الفطر حتى يلين، ثم أضف السبانخ واطبخ حتى تذبل.
اخلط الأرز، وتبّل بصلصة الصويا، وحرّك جيدًا قبل التقديم.

recipes.name: سلطة السبانخ مع بذور القرع
directions: في وعاء، اخلط السبانخ الطازجة مع الجزر المبشور وشرائح التفاح.
أضف بذور القرع وجبن الفيتا المفتت.
رش خل البلسميك وزيت الزيتون قبل التقديم.

recipes.name: وعاء السبانخ والبيض مع الطماطم
directions: اقلِ السبانخ والطماطم الكرزية بزيت الزيتون حتى تطرى.
ضع بيضتين مسلوقتين مقطعتين فوق المزيج، ورش الفلفل الأسود.
قدّمها دافئة في وعاء أو فوق التوست.

recipes.name: طبق السبانخ والبطاطا الحلوة
directions: حمّص مكعبات البطاطا الحلوة بزيت الزيتون حتى تصبح ذهبية.
اقلِ السبانخ حتى تذبل، وتبّل بخفة.
قدّم السبانخ والبطاطا الحلوة جنبًا إلى جنب أو معًا في وعاء.

ar.name: كينوا
ar.short_description: حبوب بروتينية كاملة غنية بالألياف والمغذيات الأساسية.
ar.long_description: الكينوا بذور خالية من الغلوتين تطهى مثل الحبوب وتشتهر بمحتواها العالي من البروتين وتوازن الأحماض الأمينية. مثالية للسلطات، والأطباق الدافئة، وأطباق الغداء الصحية والمشبعة.

recipes.name: وعاء الكينوا بالخضار
directions: اطبخ الكينوا حسب التعليمات.
ابخر البروكلي والجزر حتى ينضجا.
في وعاء، اخلط الكينوا مع الخضار المطهية والأفوكادو المقطع.
رش عصير الليمون وزيت الزيتون قبل التقديم.

recipes.name: سلطة الكينوا والحمص
directions: في وعاء، اخلط الكينوا المطبوخة مع الحمص، والخيار المفروم، والطماطم.
أضف البقدونس الطازج وقلّب مع زيت الزيتون وعصير الليمون والملح والفلفل.
قدّمها باردة أو بدرجة حرارة الغرفة.

recipes.name: وعاء الكينوا والفاصوليا السوداء
directions: اخلط الكينوا المطبوخة مع الفاصوليا السوداء، والذرة، والفلفل الأحمر المفروم.
أضف الكمون وعصير الليمون لإضفاء النكهة.
زَيِّن بالكزبرة المفرومة وقدم.

recipes.name: طبق الكينوا مع الحمص
directions: ضع الحمص على طبق وافرشه قليلاً.
أضف الكينوا المطبوخة، وشرائح الخيار، وقطع الطماطم.
رش القليل من البابريكا وبضع قطرات من زيت الزيتون.

recipes.name: كينوا مع التوفو المقلي
directions: قلّب مكعبات التوفو بزيت السمسم حتى تصبح ذهبية.
أضف الفلفل والبازلاء السكرية وقلّب قليلاً.
اخلط مع الكينوا المطبوخة وصلصة الصويا. قدّمها ساخنة.

recipes.name: سلطة الكينوا والأفوكادو
directions: اخلط الكينوا مع الأفوكادو المفروم، والبصل الأحمر، والكزبرة في وعاء.
أضف عصير الليمون، وزيت الزيتون، والملح، والفلفل حسب الرغبة.
قدّمها باردة أو بدرجة حرارة الغرفة.

recipes.name: وعاء كينوا مع البيض المسلوق
directions: قطّع البيض المسلوق وضعه فوق الكينوا.
أضف السبانخ المطهية ورش القليل من صلصة الطحينية.
زَيِّن ببذور السمسم إذا رغبت.

recipes.name: وعاء الكينوا والبطاطا الحلوة
directions: حمّص مكعبات البطاطا الحلوة بزيت الزيتون والكمون حتى تنضج.
قدّمها فوق الكينوا وزَيِّن بالجرجير.
رش مزيج من عصير الليمون والطحينية.

ar.name: بذور اليقطين
ar.short_description: بذور مقرمشة وغنية بالمغنيسيوم والزنك والبروتين.
ar.long_description: بذور اليقطين مصدر نباتي قوي للبروتين، وتوفر مغذيات أساسية ودهون صحية. تضيف قرمشة مرضية للسلطات والأطباق والأصناف القابلة للدهن، مما يعزز الطعم والقيمة الغذائية.

recipes.name: سلطة السبانخ وبذور اليقطين
directions: ضع السبانخ الطازج في وعاء.
أضف طماطم شيري، وخيار مقطع، وجزر مبشور.
رش بذور اليقطين فوقها وصب تتبيلة الليمون.

recipes.name: وعاء الكينوا وبذور اليقطين
directions: في وعاء، اخلط الكينوا المطبوخة مع البروكلي المطهو والفلفل الأحمر المفروم.
رش بذور اليقطين والبقدونس المفروم فوقها.
صب زيت الزيتون وعصير الليمون قبل التقديم.

recipes.name: رول الحمص وبذور اليقطين
directions: افرد الحمص على خبز التورتيلا الأسمر.
أضف السبانخ، والجزر المبشور، وشرائح الخيار.
رش بذور اليقطين ولفه بإحكام.

recipes.name: سلطة العدس وبذور اليقطين
directions: اخلط العدس المطبوخ مع الطماطم والخيار المقطع.
أضف البقدونس المفروم وبذور اليقطين.
تبل بعصير الليمون، وزيت الزيتون، والملح، والفلفل.

recipes.name: وعاء التوفو وبذور اليقطين
directions: اقلي التوفو حتى يصبح ذهبي ومقرمش قليلاً.
قدّمه مع الكالي المطهو والأرز البني.
رش بذور اليقطين فوقه وصب صلصة الصويا.

recipes.name: سلطة البيض وبذور اليقطين
directions: قطّع البيض المسلوق وضعه فوق الخضار الورقية.
أضف طماطم شيري وشرائح الخيار.
رش بذور اليقطين والتتبيلة المفضلة.

recipes.name: طبق البطاطا الحلوة وبذور اليقطين
directions: حمص مكعبات البطاطا الحلوة بزيت الزيتون والبابريكا.
قدّمها فوق الجرجير أو السبانخ ورش بذور اليقطين.
أضف القليل من صلصة الطحينية إذا رغبت.

recipes.name: سلطة الخيار وبذور اليقطين
directions: قطّع الخيار إلى شرائح رفيعة وامزجه مع الجزر المبشور.
رش بذور اليقطين وصب خل الأرز وزيت السمسم.
اخلط جيدًا وقدمه باردًا.

ar.name: بيض مسلوق
ar.short_description: إضافة غنية بالبروتين إلى وجبة الغداء، متعددة الاستخدامات ومشبعة.
ar.long_description: البيض المسلوق مصدر مريح ومغذٍ للبروتين والدهون الصحية والفيتامينات. من السهل تحضيره ومثالي للسلطات والسندويشات والأطباق المتنوعة.

recipes.name: توست الأفوكادو مع البيض المسلوق
directions: حمص شريحة من خبز الحبوب الكاملة.
اهرَس الأفوكادو على التوست ورش الملح والفلفل.
قطّع البيض المسلوق وضعه فوق الأفوكادو.
رش رقائق الفلفل الحار أو توابل البيغل حسب الرغبة.

recipes.name: وعاء الكينوا مع البيض المسلوق
directions: اطبخ الكينوا واتركها لتبرد قليلاً.
ضع الكينوا في وعاء مع شرائح البيض المسلوق، طماطم شيري، وسبانخ.
صب زيت الزيتون وعصير الليمون قبل التقديم.

recipes.name: رول البيض المسلوق بالخضار
directions: قطّع البيض المسلوق وامزجه مع الخيار والطماطم المقطعة.
افرد الحمص على خبز تورتيلا القمح الكامل وأضف خليط البيض.
لفه بإحكام وقطعه إلى نصفين للتقديم.

recipes.name: وعاء سلطة البيض
directions: قطّع البيض المسلوق وضعه فوق مزيج من الخضار الورقية.
أضف شرائح الخيار، طماطم شيري، وجزر مبشور.
اسكب زيت الزيتون والخل البلسمي كتتبيلة.

recipes.name: وعاء البطاطا الحلوة والبيض
directions: حمص مكعبات البطاطا الحلوة حتى تنضج.
رتبها في وعاء مع السبانخ وشرائح البيض المسلوق.
أضف صوص الطحينة أو عصير الليمون حسب الرغبة.

recipes.name: سلطة البيض والتوفو
directions: قطّع التوفو واقليه قليلاً حتى يصبح ذهبياً.
اخلطه مع البيض المسلوق المقطع، والطماطم، والخيار.
تبل بزيت السمسم وصلصة الصويا وقلّب برفق قبل التقديم.

recipes.name: وعاء البيض والعدس
directions: اطبخ العدس وتبّله بالكمون والملح وعصير الليمون.
ضع شرائح البيض المسلوق فوقه مع بقدونس مفروم.
قدمه دافئًا مع خبز بيتا أو أرز إذا رغبت.

recipes.name: وعاء الأرز البني مع البيض المسلوق
directions: ضع الأرز البني المطبوخ في وعاء.
أضف شرائح البيض المسلوق، الجزر المبشور، وشرائح الخيار.
صب صلصة الصويا ورش بذور السمسم.

ar.name: بطاطا حلوة
ar.short_description: خضار جذرية غنية بالألياف وحلاوتها طبيعية، مثالية لأوعية الغداء واللفائف.
ar.long_description: البطاطا الحلوة مليئة بالألياف، والكربوهيدرات المعقدة، والفيتامينات مثل A و C. تضيف نكهة حلوة طبيعية وقوامًا كريميًا لأطباق الغداء، وتتناسب جيدًا مع الحبوب والبقوليات والخضار.

recipes.name: وعاء بوذا بالبطاطا الحلوة
directions: حمص مكعبات البطاطا الحلوة بزيت الزيتون والتوابل حتى تصبح طرية.
في وعاء، ضع طبقات من الكينوا، الحمص، السبانخ، والأفوكادو.
رش الطحينية أو صوص الليمون قبل التقديم.

recipes.name: سلطة الكينوا والبطاطا الحلوة
